text:
[Verse]
Under the stars glow bright
Whispering dreams tonight
Soft lights fill the sky
Lost in the galaxy high

[Verse 2]
Moon shines beyond trees
Cool wind gentle breeze
Hearts feel the magic right
Wondrous starry night

[Chorus]
Starry night let's fly
Catch the dreams up high
In the dark we shine
Starry night so divine

[Verse 3]
Oh we're dancing slow
In the cosmic show
Time and space stand still
Feel the midnight thrill

[Bridge]
No need to say goodbye
Let the night pass by
Eyes closed we keep our sights
Lifted by starry lights

[Verse 4]
With you by my side
Through the velvet tide
Distant worlds in sight
Love in the starry night
title: Starry Night
